meanings.sent1: The school decided to ban cellphones during class hours.
meanings.sent2: The government may ban smoking in public places for health reasons.
meanings.sent3: It would be funny if they tried to ban bananas just because they are yellow.
meanings.sent4: The strict teacher would ban any talking in her classroom.
meanings.sent5: The sign clearly stated, 'No Entry - Ban on Unauthorized Personnel.'

meanings.definition: An official or legal prohibition on something
meanings.sent1: The new law imposed a ban on plastic bags to protect the environment.
meanings.sent2: The ban on fireworks ensured everyone's safety during the event.
meanings.sent3: The ban on loud music after 10 pm was a relief for the neighbors.
meanings.sent4: The ban on outside food in the cinema was strictly enforced.
meanings.sent5: The ban on single-use plastics aimed to reduce pollution in the oceans.
